Symbol.Script_3D:
if show_el=0 then end IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_pen if show_axis then MEP_cline_pen = gs_cont_pen
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN gs_DuctMat = sMat ENDIF
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
ADD -A/2, -B/2, 0 BLOCK A, B, ZZYZX DEL 1
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
ConPosX_3 = -A/2 ConPosY_3 = MIN (MAX (ConPosY_3, -B/2+ConWidth_3/2), B/2-ConWidth_3/2) ConPosZ_3 = MIN (MAX (ConPosZ_3, ConWidth_3/2+(ConPosZ_4+ConWidth_4/2)*ConStatus_4), ZZYZX-ConWidth_3/2) ConPosX_4 = -A/2 ConPosY_4 = MIN (MAX (ConPosY_4, -B/2+ConWidth_4/2), B/2-ConWidth_4/2) ConPosZ_4 = MIN (MAX (ConPosZ_4, ConWidth_4/2), -ConWidth_4/2+(ConPosZ_3-ConWidth_3/2)*ConStatus_3) ConPosZ_3 = MIN (MAX (ConPosZ_3, ConWidth_3/2+(ConPosZ_4+ConWidth_4/2)*ConStatus_4), ZZYZX-ConWidth_3/2)
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 17, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 17
END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Coil
if show_el=0 then end CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen if show_axis then MEP_cline_pen = gs_cont_pen PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
HOTSPOT2 A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
ROT2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED))+SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND SYMB_MIRRORED)
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConShow_1=0, ConEdit_1 = 1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConShow_2=0, ConEdit_2 = 1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConShow_3=0, ConEdit_3 = 13, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConShow_4=0, ConEdit_4 = 13 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name
EPS = 0.0001
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Coils
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0 ui_con_type[4] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF A<0.10 THEN A=0.10 IF B<0.10 THEN B=0.10 IF ZZYZX<0.10 THEN ZZYZX=0.10
VALUES "A" RANGE [0.10, ] VALUES "B" RANGE [0.10, ] VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [0.10, ] ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Воздуховода #1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 0 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, A-ConWallThickness_1*2] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_1*2]
PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = -B/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ZZYZX/2 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Воздуховода #2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, A-ConWallThickness_2*2] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_2*2]
PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = B/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ZZYZX/2 ConPosX_2 = 0 ConPosY_2 = B/2 ConPosZ_2 = ZZYZX/2 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #1`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN ConWidth_30= MIN (MAX (0.001, ConWidth_3), B, ZZYZX-ConWidth_4*ConStatus_4) IF ConWidth_3>MIN (B, ZZYZX-ConWidth_4*ConStatus_4) THEN PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=ConWidth_30 ConWidth_3= ConWidth_30 VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE [0.001, MIN (B, ZZYZX-ConWidth_4*ConStatus_4)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConWidth_3 ConDepth_3 = ConWidth_3 VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0, ] ConLength_3= MAX (0, ConLength_3)
PARAMETERS ConPosX_3 = -A/2 VALUES "ConPosY_3" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_3/2, B/2-ConWidth_3/2] VALUES "ConPosZ_3" RANGE [ConWidth_3/2+(ConPosZ_4+ConWidth_4/2)*ConStatus_4, ZZYZX-ConWidth_3/2] ConPosX_3 = -A/2 ConPosY_3 = MIN (MAX (ConPosY_3, -B/2+ConWidth_3/2), B/2-ConWidth_3/2) ConPosZ_3 = MIN (MAX (ConPosZ_3, ConWidth_3/2+(ConPosZ_4+ConWidth_4/2)*ConStatus_4), ZZYZX-ConWidth_3/2) ELSE CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0" ENDIF
! --- 4th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #2`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ZZYZX<ConWidth_3*ConStatus_3+ConWidth_4*ConStatus_4 THEN IF ConStatus_3 THEN ConWidth_3= ZZYZX/(ConStatus_3+ConStatus_4) PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=ConWidth_3 ENDIF IF ConStatus_4 THEN ConWidth_4= ZZYZX/(ConStatus_3+ConStatus_4) PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=ConWidth_4 ENDIF ENDIF
ConWidth_40= MIN (MAX (0.001, ConWidth_4), B, ZZYZX-ConWidth_3*ConStatus_3) IF ConWidth_4>MIN (B, ZZYZX-ConWidth_3*ConStatus_3) THEN PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=ConWidth_40 ConWidth_4= ConWidth_40 VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE [0.001, MIN (B, ZZYZX-ConWidth_3*ConStatus_3)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConWidth_4 ConDepth_4 = ConWidth_4 VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE [0, ] ConLength_4= MAX (0, ConLength_4)
PARAMETERS ConPosX_4 = -A/2 VALUES "ConPosY_4" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_4/2, B/2-ConWidth_4/2] VALUES "ConPosZ_4" RANGE [ConWidth_4/2, -ConWidth_4/2+(ConPosZ_3-ConWidth_3/2)*ConStatus_3] ConPosX_4 = -A/2 ConPosY_4 = MIN (MAX (ConPosY_4, -B/2+ConWidth_4/2), B/2-ConWidth_4/2) ConPosZ_4 = MIN (MAX (ConPosZ_4, ConWidth_4/2), -ConWidth_4/2+(ConPosZ_3-ConWidth_3/2)*ConStatus_3) ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #1`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
ConPosZ_3 = MIN (MAX (ConPosZ_3, ConWidth_3/2+(ConPosZ_4+ConWidth_4/2)*ConStatus_4), ZZYZX-ConWidth_3/2)
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0" ENDIF
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
